title: My Father-in-Law Plays Favorites - Part 2
description:
In part 2 of this call, Christian joins his wife to discuss the ways they can avoid conflicts with Christian's father and brothers during future family gatherings. - Dr. Laura: "Take control by hosting your family get-togethers."

How's your relationship with your in-laws? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
